_comment_INFRA-M-08: Each exclusion below is documented. Do NOT add new exclusions without security team approval.
_reason_naming-convention: Project uses custom naming conventions that differ from Solidity style guide (e.g., MUSD, SMUSD).
_reason_pragma: OpenZeppelin v5 dependencies use different pragma versions than project contracts.
_reason_solc-version: Pinned to 0.8.26 per project convention; OZ deps may differ.
_reason_missing-inheritance: FP: Contracts implement interface methods without explicit inheritance (BorrowModule/IBorrowModule etc). Reviewed 2026-02-16.
_reason_low-level-calls: Intentional pattern for ETH transfers in ETHPool.sol. Reviewed 2026-02-16.
_reason_unindexed-event-address: Informational: non-critical event indexing style choice. Reviewed 2026-02-16.
_reason_unused-state: FP: __gap variables are standard UUPS upgrade storage reservation pattern. Reviewed 2026-02-16.
_reason_too-many-digits: FP: Hex constant in UniswapV3TWAPOracle is a fixed-point math constant. Reviewed 2026-02-16.
_reason_calls-loop: Bounded loops over admin-controlled strategy arrays (max 10 strategies). Reviewed 2026-02-16.
_reason_reentrancy-benign_events: Functions use CEI pattern; only event ordering differs. Reviewed 2026-02-16.
_reason_timestamp: Legitimate use for cooldowns, rate limiting, and yield accrual. Reviewed 2026-02-16.
_reason_locked-ether: Only triggers on mock contracts in test paths. Reviewed 2026-02-16.
